title: How to Cancel a Fabletics Membership

steps.title: Fabletics doesn’t charge a fee when you cancel your VIP membership.
steps.content: Fabletics doesn’t charge a fee when you cancel your VIP membership. You may be wondering, how does Fabletics work? Will canceling be a huge hassle? Nope! Not only is the cancellation process super simple, but you also won’t lose out on unused Member Credits—just remember that they’ll expire 12 months after purchase. [1] X Research source

steps.title: End your Fabletics membership from your Account Page.
steps.content: End your Fabletics membership from your Account Page . First, enter your account’s username and password. Once you’re in, click your profile icon up in the right corner of the page. From here, you’ll choose the “Cancel” option. You’re in the clear! Fabletics might prompt you with questions about your choice to leave. Don’t worry, this won’t affect your cancellation. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Reach a Fabletics team member at 1-844-322-5384 to cancel.
steps.content: Reach a Fabletics team member at 1-844-322-5384 to cancel. This line is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Before you call, have your account’s phone number and login credentials on deck. They may ask you for this information to confirm that you’re the true owner of the account. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Message a team member for help with your cancellation.
steps.content: Message a team member for help with your cancellation. Navigate to the “Help & Contact” section of the Fabletics site to reach a screen with multiple option panels. Under these, you’ll notice a message in small lettering, “Still can't find what you're looking for? Contact Us.” Click “Contact Us.” Choose “Live Chat.” [4] X Research source Fill in your information. Click “Start Chat.” Ask the Fabletics team member to help you cancel your account.

steps.title: Ask to cancel your account over social messaging.
steps.content: Ask to cancel your account over social messaging. From the contact page , select "Membership." Then, choose the "Facebook Messenger" option. Then, log in to your Facebook account and be put in touch with a rep. Team members are available to help 24/7. [5] X Research source Explain that you're looking to cancel your account, and a team member will complete the process for you.

steps.title: Email support@fabletics.com to cancel your Fabletics account.
steps.content: Email support@fabletics.com to cancel your Fabletics account. Write that you want to cancel your VIP membership in the email's subject line and in the text. Then, be sure to include your subscription details and personal information—that way, the rep can cancel your account immediately. [6] X Research source Ask for a cancelation confirmation email so you have proof that your request was completed.

steps.title: If you're not sure you want to cancel, opt out of your monthly fee.
steps.content: If you're not sure you want to cancel, opt out of your monthly fee. Wait until the 1st-5th of the month. On these days, your account online will have a new option window that says, “Skip This Month.” Click this and follow their prompts This will allow you to successfully avoid your monthly fee. [7] X Research source Keep in mind that while you're taking a break from Fabletics, you won't have access to the same membership perks. This is an option every month on your account.
